Accessibility.Feedback: Required computing resources are listed, but no background requirements or skills needed mentioned

Transparency of Policies.Feedback: Policy on academic integrity and grading here, would require further editing to match university-specific information

Alignment.Feedback: Very little hands-on work to meet learning objectives, would require moderate revisions to accommodate

Appropriateness.Feedback: Content moves too quick (going from ML basics to deep learning lecture followed by NLP lecture). Does not introduce any fundamentals for understanding AI such as simple shortest path algorithms etc.

Alignment.Feedback: Some questions are quite vague and solutions lack depth or explanation

Clarity.Feedback: Simple multiple choice provided but no grading criteria or expectations are provided beyond solution given

Variety.Feedback: Assessments all seem to be structured roughly the same

Coherence.Feedback: Course content moves too quickly and skips over some important fundamentals

Alignment.Feedback: Not enough hands-on work to align with learning objectives
